author: andschwa
body: @dgrala This should take care of the rest of 52a781e6bcf43999923c19fb94ce404ad615bf5c, where the files themselves are imported. I assume you have a WIP branch somewhere with the project.json that makes this build? We should probably not merge this until we can confirm things build correctly, but I'll leave it up so we have the files imported with the right information. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/936)

comments.author: dgrala
comments.body: Cool, I'm using "darek" branch for WIP. FullCLR builds correctly, but I'm working through CoreCLR issues.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Re-opening and updating so that #962 can have a better diff.

title: Import PackageManagement files from [SD:700586]
